# <a name="turn-off-focused-inbox"></a><span data-ttu-id="75731-102">關閉焦點收件匣</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="75731-102">Turn off Focused Inbox</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="75731-103">在頁面頂端，選取齒輪圖示</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="75731-103">At the top of the page, select the gear icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="75731-104">若要開啟 [設定] 窗格。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="75731-104">to open the Settings pane.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="75731-105">在 [設定] 窗格中，移至關閉**焦點收件匣**切換。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="75731-105">In the Settings pane, move the **Focused Inbox** toggle to off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="75731-106">如需詳細資訊，請參閱[關閉焦點收件匣](https://support.office.com/article/f714d94d-9e63-4217-9ccb-6cb2986aa1b2#bkmk_outlookonweb)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="75731-106">For more information, see [Turn off Focused Inbox](https://support.office.com/article/f714d94d-9e63-4217-9ccb-6cb2986aa1b2#bkmk_outlookonweb).</span></span>
